name: BLADE KILLER - Blade Killer EP
description: NWOBHM via Los Angeles, California. For fans of early Iron Maiden, Tygers of Pan Tang, Cloven Hoof, etc.

name: HORROR PIKNIK - Speed Metal is Alive CD
description: Cult old-school speed/thrash metal from Eastern Europe! For fans of Kreator, Destruction, Slayer, Exumer, etc. Enhanced CD, featuring 5 promo video clips in the multimedia section.

name: BARSOOM - Under the Moons of Mars CD
description: One of the most amazing private albums to ever emerge from Russia. A conceptual story based on Edgar Rice Burroughs' Barsoom Sci-Fi series. A MUST-HAVE for fans of early era BLIND GUARDIAN, MANIA, HELLOWEEN, CHROMING ROSE, SCANNER, etc. Special NICE-PRICE release!

name: REGIME - Demo Anthology CD
description: US power/prog metal for fans of FATES WARNING, CRIMSON GLORY, KINGSBANE, early PSYCHOTIC WALTZ, etc.

name: CAPTAIN TRIPS - The Dance of Untruth CD
description: Thrash metal from down unda for fans of MORTAL SIN, NOTHING SACRED, BEZERKER, RAMPAGE

name: STRYCTNYNE - Demo Anthology CD
description: US classic metal for fans of MANOWAR, JUDAS PRIEST, LEATHER NUNN, MALICE, WARRIOR, GLACIER, etc.

name: SHADOWKILLER - Slaves of Egypt CD
description: US power/prog metal influenced by Wheel of Time and Game of Thrones series, among others.

name: MORTYR - Rise of the Tyrant CD
description: Thrash metal with violent edge for fans of early ANNIHILATOR, DARK ANGEL, INFERNAL MAJESTY, and SLAYER

name: ROCKA ROLLAS - Metal Strikes Back CD
description: Power/Speed metal for fans of Judas Priest, Grave Digger, Running Wild, early Helloween, etc.

name: BLAZON STONE - Return to Port Royal CD
description: Pirate era RUNNING WILD worship!

name: ALGEBRA - Polymorph + Procreation CD
description: Techno-thrash from the land of alpine skiing and milk chocolate. Contains the "Procreation" EP 2009 as bonus. For fans of TARGET, CORONER, HOLY MOSES, LUNACY, etc.

name: STEEL AGGRESSOR - Mourning Star... Total Eclipse CD
description: Dark Medieval US power metal for fans of early Blind Guardian, Iced Earth, Morningstar, Wizzard (Fin), etc.

name: TRAITOR - Metal Command +4 CD
description: German Teutonic Thrash Metal in the best tradition of EXUMER, DEATHROW, KREATOR, DARKNESS, etc. Expanded limited eddition with 4 demo bonuses

name: REIGN OF FURY - World Detonation CD
description: New wave of classic thrash metal from UK, in the vein of XENTRIX, TESTAMENT, TORANAGA, SLAMMER, mid-80s era METALLICA, etc. Special NICE-PRICE CD, limited to 500

name: Jewels of Gwahlur Volumes 1-5 BUNDLE
description: You get all 5 Volumes: Jewels of Gwahlur demo series Vol. #1: GLADIUS Jewels of Gwahlur demo series Vol. #2: GRAVEN RITE Jewels of Gwahlur demo series Vol. #3: TERMINUS Jewels of Gwahlur demo series Vol. #4: VIGILANCE Jewels of Gwahlur demo series Vol. #5: WILDHUNT

name: Jewels of Gwahlur demo series Vol. #1: GLADIUS
description: Pilot installment of our new Jewels of Gwhalur demo series, dedicated to current bands playing in the vein of the olde. Volume #1: GLADIUS, a speed/thrash retro madness from Oregon, for fans of Nasty Savage, Have Mercy, Blessed Death, etc.

name: Jewels of Gwahlur demo series Vol. #2: GRAVEN RITE
description: Volume #2: GRAVEN RITE, arcane epic metal revivalists from Texas, akin to 80s masters such as Tramontane, Manilla Road, Longings Past, Cirith Ungol, etc.

name: Jewels of Gwahlur demo series Vol. #3: TERMINUS
description: Volume #3: TERMINUS, traditional Heavy Metal with NWOBHM flair. For fans of Isen Torr, Lord Weird Slough Feg, Thin Lizzy, etc.

name: Jewels of Gwahlur demo series Vol. #4: VIGILANCE
description: Volume #4: VIGILANCE, Crunchy, occult, NWOBHM flavored traditional metal for fans of early Iron Maiden, Cloven Hoof, Angel Witch, etc.

name: Jewels of Gwahlur demo series Vol. #5: WILDHUNT
description: Volume #5: WILDHUNT, 80s teutonic power/speed metal for fans of RISK, DRIFTER, PARADOX, etc.

name: TYRANT'S REIGN - Year of the Tyrants +1 CD
description: A cult US power/speed grenade from 1987. Comes with one exclusive bonus track, and 12-page booklet crammed with band info, archive photos, lyrics, and more. For fans of Amulance, Heathen's Rage, Toxik, Realm, Wrath, etc.

name: WRATH - Mutants 2CD/DVD Set
description: A special 2CD/DVD bundle featuring "Fit of Anger" and "Nothing to Fear" albums and an "In Concert" DVD with archive live performances from 1987. All CDs and the DVD are packaged separately in jewel cases with massive booklets crammed with band story, info, archive photos, lyrics, and more. The set includes: CD1: Fit of Anger CD CD2: Nothing to Fear CD DVD: In Concert DVD For fans of Metal Church, Living Death, Armored Saint, Amulance, Tyrant's Reign, etc.

name: STORMSPELL RELEASES [A to J]
description:
STORMSPELL RELEASES [A to J] $7.00 CLEARANCE SALE on SELECTED STORMSPELL TITLES. PLEASE NOTE NOT ALL TITLES ARE $7.00 - USE THE PULL-DOWN MENU TO SEE THE PRICES, THANKS!
Use the pull-down menu below to select the title you want to buy. Available titles are: AERIAN RAGE - Fist of Steel CD FEW EXTRA COPIES IN STOCK! This title is officially sold-out. However, I have a handful overstock leftovers, which I'm selling at reduced $7.00 due popular demand. Those copies are identical to the regular cds in any way, but for a punched hole through the numbering field. Pilot installment of our brand new "RED, WHITE, and HEAVY" Collector's Series, dedicated to arcane 80s demos and hidden gems. Lost, but not forgotten! Classic US heavy/power metal from South California. This is compilation of all demos recorded between 1983 to 1985, which should appeal to fans of Ruthless, Thrust, Leatherwolf, Omen, Dark Age, Savage Grace, etc. WARNING: Raw garage demo recordings inside. This is raw real metal, as forged back in the day. For dedicated die-hard fans and collectors only. Be advised and buy accordingly, thanks!
AIR RAID - Night of the Axe CD SOLD OUT Due to circumstances outside of our control this title has been shelved and no re-press is planned. Look out for Air Raid's sophomore album with new vocalist in early 2014! New Wave of Classic Heavy Metal from Sweden. If you like Judas Priest, Iron Maiden, Accept, and Running Wild, this album is A MUST for you!
ANCIENT CROSS - Ancient Cross CD Texan classic power metal following the steps of Reverend, early Metal Church, Syrus, Wyzard, early Crimson Glory, etc. Fans of epic metal with soaring vocals should take note. 12-page booklet with info, all lyrics, pictures, and liner notes. Custom artwork by Alan Lathwell Recommended for fans of: REVEREND, METAL CHURCH, SYRUS, CRIMSON GLORY, early QUEENSRYCHE, WYZARD, etc.
ARACHNID - Arachnid CD 8th installment of our RWH demo collector's series. Cult and arcane thrash masters ARACHNID from Portland, Oregon. Pure, raw, and aggressive 80s thrash with looming, dark, and mysterious atmosphere. For fans of SINDROME, MORBID SAINT, and SEPULTURA (Beneath the Remains circa)
ASSASSIN / DEADLY ASSASSIN - The Metal Knights CD Arcane Christian power/speed metal from Minneapolis, MN. Think of Lords of Crimson Alliance meets early Nasty Savage and Anthrax (Neil Turbin era), topped with insane over-the-top King Diamond-esque vocals. The band was known originally as ASSASSIN releasing a cassette tape demo entitled "Metal Massacre" in 1987, but later changed name to DEADLY ASSASSIN to avoid confusion with the numerous bands using the same moniker. Only a very rough recording of their 1987 demo survived the test of time, so this is going to be a TRUE ARCANE release for the INITIATED only. Be forewarned, or die screaming under the hooves of the metal crusade!
BATTLECRY - Cry of the Warrior CD SOLD OUT!
CHEMICAL ANNIHILATION - Why Die? CD+DVD A raw and toxic thrash straight from the gutters of Portland, OR. Features the classic album "Why Die?" and their first Demo, both from 1989, digitally remastered for your ultimate listening pleasure. The release has been expanded into a double CD+DVD set and includes a professionally shot multi-camera live DVD which features two exclusive songs not incuded on the CD. Recommended for fans of: NUCLEAR ASSAULT, NUM SKULL, REVENANT, GAMMACIDE, etc.
COLDSTEEL - 20 Years of NY Thrash: The Demo Anthology CD The 4th installment on our "Red, White, and Heavy" oldschool collector series - COLD STEEL! A cult 80s underground speed/thrash metal from NYC similar to state-mates Overkill, Anthrax, Dead On, etc. This CD is compilation of COLD STEEL's highly acclaimed 80s demos: Dead By Dawn (1988), Scarred for Life (1988), and Perfect Peace (1990) Recommended for fans of: OVERKILL, ANTHRAX, DEAD ON, TYRANT'S REIGN, HEATHEN'S RAGE, etc.
DANTESCO - Dantesco CD Traditional epic heavy/doom metal with soaring vocals. Remastered CD release of the classic 2004 demo with three bonus tracks for your ultimate listening pleasure! Recommended for fans of: CANDLEMASS, DOOMSWORD, WARLORD, DIO, BLACK SABBATH, etc.
DANTESCO - Seven Years of Battle CD Traditional epic heavy/doom metal with soaring vocals. 8 Brand new songs of grandiose dark epic metal with doomy overtones. Recommended for fans of: CANDLEMASS, DOOMSWORD, WARLORD, DIO, BLACK SABBATH, etc.
DARK BLACK - Midnight Wraith EP SOLD OUT
DETEST - Thundersteel: Demo Anthology 2CD 7th installment of our RWH demo collector's series. Sweden's finest and equally arcane 80s epic metal heroes: DETEST - A MASSIVE Double 2CD Set featuring their cult "Thundersteel" MLP 1990 plus myriad of demos recorded between 1998-1991. A must have for fans of Manowar, Doomsword, and Metal Church, just to name a few.
DRIFTER - The Demos 1985-1986 CD LAST COPIES IN STOCK! The ultimate collection of the legendary early demos by the Swiss power/thrash 80es masters. For fans of: Angel Dust, Paradox, Apocalypse(CHE), Lunacy, Poltergeist, Stormhammer, Accu§er, Tyrant, etc.
ELDRITCH RITE - Eldritch Rite EP Stormspell Records is proud to announce the re-release of one of the cultest demos ever to emerge from the Texas metal underground. Recorded in 1986 within a day at the Pantego studio owned by the famous Jerry Abbott (Dime and Vinnie's dad), this demo promptly became a landmark of what Progressive Power Metal would be. Now released for first time on CD ever, digitally remastered and with 3 bonustracks. 12-page stapled booklet with band bio, lyrics, and pictures. Enhanced multimedia CD with a "secret" DIEHARD TREASURE CHEST folder crammed with tons of rehearsal tunes in their raw and unpolished glory. Recommended for fans of: SCYTHIAN OATH, ASSALANT, SYRUS, ROTTING CORPSE, etc.
ELM STREET - Barbed Wire Metal CD LAST COPIES IN STOCK! The New Wave of Traditional Heavy Metal has a new face with ELM STREET unleashing their own brand of classic heavy metal to the masses via Stormspell Records. "Barbed Wire Metal" features 8 balls-to-the-wall tracks influenced by bands such as Iron Maiden, Judas Priest, Savatage, and Testament. Comes with free Leatherface Beer Security fridge magnet.
FISCHEL'S BEAST - Commencement CD LAST COPIES IN STOCK! FISCHELs BEAST is the new solo project of the ex-SENTINEL BEAST axeman Barry Fischel. Commencement is their pilot release, entirely consisting of material written in 1987 for the second SENTINEL BEAST album, which due to the band's untimely demise never got released. Anyhow, you should know what to expect: a classic, oldschool, intense US power/speed metal in the vein of Sentinel Beast (obviously), early Vicious Rumors, Savage Grace, and Slauter Xstroyes just to name a few. 12-page booklet with band info, all lyrics, pictures, and liner notes. Custom artwork by Dimitar Nikolov Recommended for fans of: SENTINEL BEAST, HEATHEN, early VICIOUS RUMORS, SAVAGE GRACE, early EXCITER, HADES, SLAUTER XSTROYES, etc.
FOG OF WAR - Fog of War CD SOLD OUT!
HELLHOUND - Anthology CD+DVD SOLD OUT! Criminally neglected cult Bay Area power/speed metal with progressive overtones. This is a reissue of their classic 1985 & 1986 demos, along with a 16-page booklet with updated liner notes, lyrics, tons of rare pictures, and brand new artwork by Dimitar Nikolov. Expanded release to a double CD/DVD set with rare video live footage taken from the ROCK TALK cable TV show from 1987 (band interview and 8 live in studio songs) Recommended for fans of: HEATHEN, DEFIANCE, DEATH ANGEL, TESTAMENT, FORBIDDEN, MILITIA, ETC.
HORDE, THE - Thy Blackened Reign CD Prepare to be taken on a journey into dark forbidden realms and all the way to the hallowed gates of Valhalla. Songs of bravery in battle, demonic warriors, clan warfare, and bewitchment that would inspire any true warrior on the fields of battle. This is real metal, played by real men of metal, for real fans of metal. Members of The HORDE have been playing together in one form or another for the better part of two decades, having played in past regional bands from the area. With marked influence from their prior groups, The HORDE brings the perfect mix of headbanging Mosh pit chaos, epic Sword & Sorcery monster battles, and a touch of classic doomage upon the masses. Influenced by the likes of Venom, Celtic Frost, old Metallica, Destruction, Kreator, Motorhead, Slayer, Cro-Mags, and Iron Maiden, Their next slab of pure battle metal will be a concept album which they are hoping to unleash in 2011 on a metal drenched fanbase. Prepare for the HORDE to take a seat amongst the Skulled thrones of previous metal masters and stand proud amongst their brothers in arms...
IMMACULATE - Atheist Crusade CD LAST COPIES IN STOCK! Total panic-attack thrash with crazy high pitched vocals and unbelievably catchy, aggressive, fast, killer fucking riffs! Recommended for fans of: Agent Steel, Have Mercy, Realm, Toxik, early Steel Prophet, etc.
INSPELL - Arcadian Tales: The Egregore CD Dark mystical blackened epic metal. Nine crunchy, fast-paced, yet majestic tales of medieval history, Tamplier orders, mystical egregores, and dark doctrinal knowledge. Limited hand-numbered release of 950 copies, first 250 of which come in glossy UV-coated slipcases. 8-page booklet with lyrics, pictures, and info. Enhanced multimedia CD including bonus video clip For fans of: Stormlord, Bal Sagoth, Radigost, Children of Bodom, Wintersun, etc...
INVECTION - Demented Perception EP New Wave of Bay-Area Thrash Metal. A hell of a Bay-Area and Kreator worshipping thrash assault! Imagine early Destruction and Kreator playing Exodus style riffs. Exclusive artwork by Dan Seagrave. Recommended for fans of: KREATOR, DESTRUCTION, EXODUS, etc.
INVECTION - Facet of Aberration CD LAST COPIES IN STOCK! Long awaited debut album by Bay Area thrashers. A ripping thrash galore with an impressive technical twist, monstrous riffing, melodic hooks courtesy of the Gothenburg classic scene, and aggressive harcore/punk-influenced vocals. Recommended for fans of: Slayer, Testament, Exodus, early In Flames, etc.
ISCARIOT - Arisen CD 9th installment of our RWH demo collector's series. ISCARIOT were early 80s mega-cult underground band from Portland, Oregon. The mystic masters of 80s dark heavy metal. For fans of Heathen's Rage, Judas Priest, Druid, Mercyful Fate.

options.name: AERIAN RAGE Fist of Steel CD
AIR RAID Night of the Axe CD
CHEMICAL ANNIHILATION Why Die? CD DVD
DANTESCO Seven Years of Battle CD
ELM STREET Barbed Wire Metal CD
HORDE, THE Thy Blackened Reign CD

name: STORMSPELL RELEASES [K to Z]
description:
STORMSPELL RELEASES [K to Z] $7.00 CLEARANCE SALE on SELECTED STORMSPELL TITLES. PLEASE NOTE NOT ALL TITLES ARE $7.00 - USE THE PULL-DOWN MENU TO SEE THE PRICES, THANKS!
Use the drop-down menu below to select the title you want to buy. Available titles are: KINGSBANE - Kingsbane / Seven Years CD LAST COPIES IN STOCK! A cult Canadian band with a great love of middle-period FATES WARNING but with melodic acumen that is completely their own. This release contains both classic demos, completely remixed and remastered by Robert DiGioia at MetalWorks studios. For fans of early DREAM THEATER, SHADOW GALLERY, ZIONS ABYSS, etc.
LAST DESCENDANTS - One Nation Under God CD LAST COPIES IN STOCK! Arcane cult power/thrash from Bay Area with progressive overtones. This is a re-release of their 1988 Album "One Nation Under God" originally released on the cult collector's label AAARRG Records out of Germany. Now digitaly remastered, and expanded with the WORLD WAR III Demo 1986 as bonus tracks. Also comes with thick booklet crammed with tons of archive photos, all lyrics, band bio written by Gary Morton, and exclusive interview by William C. Ackerman. You can save the $200+ this CD (and bootlegs) fetch on eGay and get it for a regular price, at last. For fans of: ARTILLERY, BELIEVER, SENTINEL BEAST, TOXIK, MEKONG DELTA, TARGET, to name a few
LICH KING - 8-bit Retro Thrash CD PLEASE NOTE: The original 299 hand-numbered copies sold out. However, we have a small quantity of extra copies which we are selling at reduced price accordingly. They are identical to the limited pressing, with a punched hole in place of an number. Tom Martin said: "For no reason at all, we started making 8-bit, NES-style adaptations of some of our songs. This collection brings 9 of these blippy thrash metal anthems together, including 2 never before heard songs from the much-awaited fourth album: "Combat Mosh" and "Wage Slave." Why would you want to buy an album of thrash metal songs adapted to sound like it's coming out of an antique video game system? I dunno but what the hell, it's awesome!"
LICH KING - Born of the Bomb CD The best thrash band in the universe unleashes their 4th abomination upon the unsuspecting world. More abrasive, obnoxious, and thrashtastic than ever! Thrash or die!
MAX PLANCK - Kill the Pain CD FEW EXTRA COPIES IN STOCK! This title is officially sold-out. However, I have a handful overstock leftovers, which I'm selling at reduced $7.00 due popular demand. Those copies are identical to the regular cds in any way, but for a punched hole through the numbering field.
MIDNIGHT PRIEST - Rainha Da Magia Negra CD LAST 5 COPIES IN STOCK! Portuguese street urchin gang giving early Iron Maiden the run for their money. Raw, gritty, in your face heavy metal with balls, delivering a massive dose of nostalgic epicness from the glorious past. Sung in Portuguese. Custom artwork by Alan Lathwell. Recommended for fans of: early IRON MAIDEN, JUDAS PRIEST, KING DIAMOND, etc.
MIDNIGHT PRIEST - Midnight Priest CD Long awaited debut album by Portuguese dark romantic masters in the vein of the olde! Fans of early Iron Maiden, Mercyful Fate, and NWOBHM in general should not miss this! Sung in Portuguese. Recommended for fans of: early IRON MAIDEN, JUDAS PRIEST, KING DIAMOND, etc.
MORBID SIN - Demos 1988-1992 CD LAST COPIES IN STOCK! Found a misplaced box while cleaning the storage space the other day, so this title is temporarily back in stock. Once those copies are gone, they will be gone. MORBID SIN was formed by Bobby Lucas (ex-SEVEN WITCHES and current OVERLORDE singer) in 1985 during his senior year of High School. Influenced by bands like Black Sabbath, Iron Maiden, Judas Priest, Overkill, Mercyful Fate, and Exciter, MORBID SIN was a blend of crunchy riffs, piercing screams, melody, tempo changes, and bombastic drumming. Recommended for fans of: HELSTAR, SEVEN WITCHES, OVERLORDE, RAVENSTHORN, DIO, classic OZZY OSBOURNE, EXCITER, JUDAS PRIEST, etc.
MORBID SIN - Sins of the Flesh CD MORBID SIN was formed by Bobby Lucas (ex-SEVEN WITCHES and current OVERLORDE singer) in 1985 during his senior year of High School. Influenced by bands like Black Sabbath, Iron Maiden, Judas Priest, Overkill, Mercyful Fate, and Exciter, MORBID SIN was a blend of crunchy riffs, piercing screams, melody, tempo changes, and bombastic drumming. "Sins of the Flesh" was the one and only MS album so far. Recorded back in 1998, but shelved and never released until today. Fans of US classic/power metal a-la HELSTAR, SEVEN WITCHES, OVERLORDE, RAVENSTHORN, etc. should take note. Recommended for fans of: HELSTAR, SEVEN WITCHES, OVERLORDE, RAVENSTHORN, DIO, classic OZZY OSBOURNE, EXCITER, JUDAS PRIEST, etc.
MORTIFIER - Anatomies Undone CD New Wave of Classic Thrash Metal from Ohio. Headbanging thrashing delight for fans of early SLAYER, HALLOWS EVE, DARK ANGEL, HOLY TERROR, KUBLAI KHAN, VIKING, E-X-E, etc.
NARVAL - Narval CD Best described as classic RAINBOW meets early DIO - very epic and dramatic music with rich 70s Prog-rock influences. Featuring DANTESCO and SACRILEGIO members. Comes with 12-page stapled booklet with lyrics, band pics and info. For fans of: DIO, RAINBOW, WARLORD, MANOWAR, BLACK SABBATH, etc.
NARWHAL TUSK - In Despair CD Female fronted operatic sympho-power metal for fans of Within Temptation, Nightwish, Delain, etc.
NATURAL SPIRIT - Sita Rosa CD Natural Spirit delivers breath-taking, grand, and heroic Slavonic folk/pagan metal, enhanced with sweet, soaring, enchanting female vocals in the best Ukrainian folklore traditions. The CD release comes packaged with beautiful 12-page stapled booklet with info in Russian and English. Recommended for fans of: ARKONA, KALEVALA, ALKONOST, AMBEHR, PAGAN REIGN, LUNARIUM, etc.
NATURAL SPIRIT - The Price of Freedom CD Dark epic folk pagan metal, with beautiful melodies, authentic folk instruments, and breath-taking female folklore vocals. Recommended for fans of Eluveitie, Kivimetsän Druidi, Korpiklaani, Arkona, Pagan Reign, Kalevala, Butterlfy Temple, Gods Tower, Skyforger, etc.
NITEFALL - Red Moon Rising CD NITEFALL, a mystical metal trio which arose on the ashes of one of the most cult thrash acts from Ohio - SEVERE WARNING. Although sharing the same band members, NITEFALL had completely different vision and sound. Named after the CANDLEMASS' classic album from 1987 and deeply rooted in the classic epic power wetal vein. This release is a collection of all 3 demos the band recorded in their short career from 1990 to 1992. 12-page stapled booklet with band bio, lyrics, archive pics, and info. Custom artwork by Raul Gonzalez For fans of: CANDLEMASS, SOLITUDE AETURNUS, TROUBLE, MISTREATER, CIRITH UNGOL, AVERON, and SEVERE WARNING
NOCTUM - The Seance CD LAST COPIES IN STOCK! Traditional doom metal from Sweden, mixing early Black Sabbath and Pentagram with 70s proto-metal influences a-la Sir Lord Baltimore and Budgie. Recommended for fans of: Black Sabbath, Pentagram, Count Raven, Sir Lord Baltimore, etc.
NOVOY ZAVET - Apocalypse CD Cult Orthodox Christian power/thrash metal with doomy overtones from the ex-Soviet Union. This album was recorded in 1993 but never officially released on CD until now. For fans of Trouble, Solitude Aeturnus, Candlemass, etc. Sung in English, albeit quite broken, but charming, creating an unique and magnetic atmosphere of mesmerizing sonic landscapes. Remastered to a terrific outcome by Igor Samoylov. You wouldn't belive how fresh and vital this thing sounds! For fans of: TROUBLE, MERCY, SOLITUDE AETURNUS, COUNT RAVEN, BLACK SABBATH, MEMORY GARDEN, CANDLEMASS, etc.
PROFANATOR - Deathplagued CD Dark, obscure, wicked, evil, superfast, raw thrash metal! Fans of bands like Infernal Majesty, Sadus, Sacrifice, Possessed, Morbid Saint, Dark Angel, Slayer ("Hell Awaits" era) etc. will really love this release. Comes in a nice elegant matte-black package with 12-page booklet and custom artwork by Santiago Armengod. Recommended for fans of: Infernal Majesty, Sadus, Sacrifice, Possessed, Morbid Saint, Dark Angel, Slayer ("Hell Awaits" era) etc.
RAPIDFIRE - Settle the Score CD Rapidfire was the band who in 1990 arose from the ashes of HELLHOUND. They combined the speedier sound of bands like HELLHOUND, VICIOUS RUMORS, METAL CHURCH with the melodic finesse of ARMORED SAINT, LEATHERWOLF, MALICE, RELLIK to name but just a few. The band did develop a sizable local following and had developed enough material for a full-length album, but they broke up in 1993 and the album never got released. So here is your chance to get yourself acquired with another piece of classic US metal history. Beautiful packaging with 12-page stapled booklet with band bio, lyrics, tons of pics and info. For fans of: HELLHOUND, RELLIK, VICIOUS RUMORS, LEATHERWOLF, METAL CHURCH, ARMORED SAINT, MALICE, SAVAGE GRACE, etc.
RESTLESS BREED - No Walls Can Hold: The Demo Anthology CD 5th installment of our "Red, White, and Heavy" demo collector's series. RESTLESS BREED were an 80's power/speed metal combo from Columbus, Ohio for fans of Nasty Savage, Sanctuary, Flotsam & Jetsam, Metal Church, and early Metallica
ROBYN DANGER - Anthology 1985-1992 CD Almost 70 minutes of female fronted classic US metal from Bay Area, California. This is a collection of all 3 mega-rare cassette EPs (1985, 1988, 1990) and demo 1992 the band have released on their own label Danger Records. Solid classic metal, getting more melodic bordering on AOR on the latter demos. So called American answer to WARLOCK, mixed with HEART and ROMEO'S DAUGHTER influences just to name a few. Recommended for fans of: WARLOCK, HEART, FEMME FATALE, ROMEO’S DAUGHTER, ARYON, etc.
ROCKA ROLLAS - The War of Steel Has Begun CD TEMP OUT OF STOCK! We will re-press 500 more copies with different artwork soon. Pure high-octane oldschool power/speed metal in the best Teutonic traditions of the 80s. If you like bands like SCANNER, MANIA, early HELLOWEEN, JUDAS PRIEST, and RUNNING WILD, you definitely would love this cd.
ROCKA ROLLAS - Conquer EP A 4-track EP by the premiere classic power/speed ROCKA ROLLAS metal machine! A MUST for RUNNING WILD, HELLOWEEN (Kai Hansen era), DIO, and JUDAS PRIEST fans. 4 exclusive tunes to give you taste of the upcoming sophomore album "Metal Strikes Back" NICE PRICE EP for $5.00 bucks only! Buy or die!
ROTTING CORPSE - The Demos CD+DVD LAST COPIES IN STOCK! Forefathers of the Texan thrash metal. Collection of all demos (16 tunes) plus bonus live DVD to boot. Essential for fans of Gammacide, Heaven's Force, Devastation, Hammerwitch, Hellpreacher, and early Slayer. Double CD+DVD with 12-page booklet loaded with detailed band story, lyrics, and tons of archive pics and flyers. For fans of: GAMMACIDE, HEAVEN'S FORCE, DEVASTATION, HAMMERWITCH, HELLPREACHER, SLAYER, etc.
SACRED GUARDIAN - Sacred Guardian CD Classic US power metal for fans of OMEN, HELSTAR, JAG PANZER, and DIO.
SERPENT SAINTS - Leather Lucifer CD True occult heavy metal from Denmark in the way of the old. Close to 30 minutes intense ordeal of pure crunchy classic metal. 12-page stapled booklet with lyrics, band pics and info. For fans of: Evil, Maltese Falcon, Mercyful Fate, Witch Cross, etc.
SOLAR - At the Dawn CD Female fronted operatic sympho-power metal for fans of Nightwish, Within Temptation, Epica, etc.
SPECTRAL INCURSION - Anthology 2CD Set A double cd set by a band which was totally ahead of their time, breaking stereotypes and genre definitions. A band which didn't consider themselves metal, yet at times delivered the most intense and neck-breaking thrash assault one can imagine. Imagine RUSH meets BLACK SABBATH, VOIVOD, and ANACRUSIS, delivered with clinical precision in unearlty odd-time signatures.
STEEL AGGRESSOR - From Ruins to Dust CD Steel Aggressor hails from Indiana and delivers a compact punch of classic power-speed metal in the vein of the olde. If 80s German speed metal with a dark fantasy flare is your game, and bands like early Blind Guardian, Paradox, Angel Dust, Vendetta, Iced Earth, etc. still bring goosebumps to your skin, then look no further. Recommended for fans of: Iced Earth, Blind Guardian, Armored Saint, Paradox, Angel Dust, etc.
STEEL HORSE - Wild Power CD Traditional heavy metal from Spain in the ways of the olde. For fans of: JUDAS PRIEST, IRON MAIDEN, SAXON, TYGERS OF PAN TANG, early TOKYO BLADE, WILD, to name a few.
THRASH CLASH Vol.1: Taking Over vs Phantom Witch CD LAST COPIES IN STOCK! This is the pilot volume of our new series dedicated to new promising thrash bands. Sharing the first volume are two young, yet very promising bands with great potential: Taking Over are a young band hailing from San Bernardino, CA and delivering intense classic thrash in the vein of the old masters like Hallows Eve, Death Angel, and Necronomicon. On their heels come Phantom Witch, young but mighty trio from Indianapolis, IN. Their stellar sonic attack worships old-school masters like Slayer, Iron Angel, and Infernal Majesty, and is guaranteed to give you severe neck pain and headbanging aches! 12-page stapled booklet with band info and lyrics, graced with stunning artwork by renowned artist Dimitar Nikolov. Strictly limited to 1000, never to be re-pressed, with hand-numbered custom OBI strips.
THRASH CLASH Vol.2: Diamond Plate vs Oppression CD LAST COPIES IN STOCK! Second volume from our Thrash split series featuring two great bands playing classic thrash in the veins of the old masters like Sadus, Kreator, Artillery, Dark Angel, and Nuclear Assault just to name a few. 12-page stapled booklet with band info and lyrics, graced with stunning artwork by renowned artist Dimitar Nikolov. Strictly limited to 1000, never to be re-pressed, with hand-numbered custom OBI strips
THRASH CLASH Vol.3: Blood Exile vs Sacrilegio CD Third volume from our Thrash Clash series. The most epic volume so far, featuring techincal thrashers Blood Exile from Mexico and Epic masters Sacrilegio from Puerto Rico. 12-page stapled booklet with band info and lyrics, graced with stunning artwork by renowned artist Dimitar Nikolov. Strictly limited to 1000, never to be re-pressed, with hand-numbered custom OBI strips
THRASH CLASH Vol.4: Infantry vs Pyrotoxic CD Fourth volume from our Thrash Clash series. The most brutal volume so far, featuring blasphemous horde Infantry from California and raw barbarian masters Pyrotoxic from the land of the thousand lakes, Finland. 12-page stapled booklet with band info and lyrics, graced with stunning artwork by renowned artist Dimitar Nikolov. Strictly limited to 1000, never to be re-pressed, with hand-numbered custom OBI strips
VANLADE - Iron Age CD Traditional heavy/power metal from Kansas. Recommended to fans of MANOWAR, SKELATOR, early DOMINE, HELSTAR, etc.
VHALDEMAR - Metal of the World CD Euro power/speed metal in the best traditions of Grave Digger, U.D.O., Gamma Ray, Rage just to name a few.
WILD - La Nueva Orden CD Debut album by those brave and wild Spanish conquistadors taking the shores of the New Wave of Traditional Heavy Metal by storm!Sung in Spanish
XINR - Beyond Woodward CD Long-lost classic metal gem from Portland, Oregon 1984 in vein of early JUDAS PRIEST, CIRITH UNGOL, HELL, early ALICE COOPER, and MERCYFUL FATE 12-page stapled booklet with brand new artwork by Alan Lathwell, band info, lyrics, rare pictures, etc. Recommended for fans of: JUDAS PRIEST, CIRITH UNGOL, HELL, early ALICE COOPER, BLACK SABBATH, and MERCYFUL FATE

name: IMPACT - Take the Pain +5 CD
description: Cult US thrash metal with catchy, aggressive, fast, killer fucking riffs! Recommended for fans of Morbid Saint, Sadus, and early Slayer to name a few. Comes with 5 live bonus tracks recorded at T.A.Verns on July 11th, 1988 Take the Pain CD CD: 1. In the Flesh 2. Take the Pain 3. Kill on Kommand 4. When the Evil Takes Its Course 5. Its the End of the World 6. To Your Death 7. Legacy of Violence 8. Knowledge is King 9. P.O.W. 10. Plague of Death 11. Erosion of Will BONUS TRACKS: Live at T.A.Verns July 11th, 1988 12. Live or Die 13. Demonica 14. Murder Rape Violence 15. When the Evil Takes its Course 16. Skill of the Kill

name: SLANDER - Careless Talk Costs Lives 2CD
description: The cult NWOBHM album from 1991, re-released as double CD set. Disc 1 contains the original album, while Disc 2 contains freshly re-recorded versions pus brand new songs. Recommended for fans of: Raven, Demon, Angel Witch, Diamond Head, Cloven Hoof, Judas Priest, etc. CD #1 1991: 1. Fighting Talk 2. On the Run 3. Scheno 4. Colour of Your Money 5. Lonely Nights 6. No Road Back 7. In your World 8. Passion Crimes 9. Shadow in the Night 10. Built to Destroy 11. Lay Down the Law 12. Cry of the Wolf CD #2 2011: 1. Fighting Talk 2. On the Run 3. Colour of Your Money 4. Lonely Nights 5. Hangman 6. In your World 7. Shadows 8. Land of Darkness 9. Midnight Train 10. This Time You Lose 11. Ends of the Circle 12. Cry of the Wolf

name: STUTZ - 3CD Box Set
description: STUTZ were an arcane 80s melodic metal from Ohio. The band had cult following and was on verge of signing a major deal with Geffen records when grunge killed the music... This 3CD Box Set contains all music STUTZ have recorded during their career (1981-1990): CD1: Killer - contains their "Made in USA" 1983 LP, originally self-released in miscroscopic qunatities and impossible to find rarity nowadays + 7" EP 1981 + Bonus tracks. CD2: Marching Into Hell - contains the "Tearin' Up The Night" 1986 album (previously self-released on cassette tape only) + Bonus tracks. CD3: Keep Runnin' - contains previously unpublished songs recorded from 1988 to 1990. Approx 60 minutes playing time per CD. Each CD comes with 12-page booklet crammed with archive photos, band story, liner notes, lyrics, custom artwork, etc. For fans of GREAT WHITE, KISS, MESSIAH PROPHET, Y&T, MOTLEY CRUE

name: TARRGA - Lost and Archives 2CD Box Set
description: Authentic 80s Sunset Strip Hair metal. You get both volumes: CD1: Lost & Archives Vol.1 CD CD2: Lost & Archives Vol.2 CD Recommended to fans of ALICE COOPER, KIX, GREAT WHITE, Y&T, and MOTLEY CRUE NOTE: This Box-set contains artistic graphical nudity on the interior artwork. You must be of legal age to purchase this item! Thank you for your understanding and compliance.

description: Thrash Metal from Colombia. Slaney Records

description: Thrash / Speed Metal from Germany. Slaney Records.

description: Raw obscure UK thrash from 1989. Re-release on Mosh Tuneage Records

name: CANDLEMASS - Chapter VI CD+DVD
description: Very underrated album, a must for every power/doom metal fan.

name: R-GENIUM - Land of Dreams CD
description: Russian answer to Nightwish

name: RELLIK - Killer CD
description: RELLIK were an awesome heavy/power metal with high-pitched vocals and screaming guitars. They arose from the ashes of Robyn Danger in 1983 and lasted until 1991. This CD compilation was put out by Iron Glory Records back in 2001 and contains almost everything the band has recorded, including the cult "Remember the Future" EP 1984. Warehouse find, pick a copy while you can. you wont regret it - awesome 80s metal for fans of AMULANCE, KRAKEN (Canada), and RUTHLESS to name a few.

name: OVERLORD SR - Medieval Metal Too CD
description: Classic heavy metal From North Carolina. Anthology type of release featuring their demos and EP from 1983 through 1989. Out of print and getting hard to find.

name: VAL GAINA (ex-KRUIZ) - Gain CD
description: Solo album by Kruiz' mastermind

name: VAL GAINA (ex-KRUIZ) - Fingertips CD
description: Solo album by Kruiz' mastermind

name: KORROZIA METALLA - Sadism CD Digipack
description: One of the most cult and influential thrash albums from CCCP. Re-release on Thrash Massacre Records (division of Metalism Records).

name: DEMONA - Metal Through the Time CD
description: $9.99 SALE! Sale valid through February 15th or until allocated quantities last - whichever comes first. Female fronted speed metal for fans of The Great Kat, Pyrotoxic, Wardance, Vectom and Iron Agel
